<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Companion's Cry](/Feats.aspx?ID=500) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=136" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 172 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Beastmaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=50) (Level 6), [Mammoth Lord](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=170) (Level 6), [Undead Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=176) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
an animal companion

</column>

---

You can urge your companion to do its utmost. You can spend 2 actions to Command an Animal instead of 1 when commanding your animal companion. If you do, your animal companion uses an additional action.
name: Companion's Cry
